resources:
Pebble Messenger Pro Reset To Default This allows Pebble Messenger to forward notifications to your pebble! Creating Unicode character database… Finished loading font database! Tap to dismiss₀ There is a message coming, but the font database is not ready. Please wait a while! If the error take long times, please rebuild the font data base at the setting view in Pebble Messenger. Unknown Person Private Number The Message is no more kept in Pebble Messenger. Please check it by phone. Notification Options the function of displaying the notifications on your Pebble. Notify when screen is on If this is set, then notifications will be sent to the Pebble when the phone\'s screen is on. Font size on Pebble The font is more large, the chars which were displayed on the Pebble screen is more few. Watch List Select which App\'s notification your want transmit to Pebble. Quiet time Allows you to prevent any notifications from being sent from Pebble messenger to your Pebble No notifications before this time Quiet time - Not before No notifications after this time Quiet time - Not after Notification Timeout
5 seconds
10 seconds
20 seconds
5000
10000
20000
Normal (16 chars* 9 lines)
Middle (12 chars* 6 lines)
Large (9 chars* 4 lines)
0
1
2
Call Options Display the incoming calls information on Pebble, and remote control your phone to answer or hang off. Enable incoming calls transmitting " Use the same Quiet Setting as Pebble-Messenger If you have set the quiet options above, and want the call messenger keep quiet in same time, check it. SMS text content for short press When the phone call is coming, press middle button of pebble to hang off the call and send a short message to explain you are busy. SMS text content for long press You can setting another short message, and send it just press middle button of pebble for 0.5 sec Sorry! I am busy and call you later. Sorry! I am in a meeting, Send me message or waiting for my call back. Initiation Setting Tools About NavigationActivity
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Hello world! Hello blank fragment
Ok Cancel
1. Check your Pebble status 2. Enable accessibility service 3. Install Pebble app 4. Check Watch List 5. Font data base status 6. The system speech engine: Language: The speech engine is failed, your pebble will not read the notification
OK Empty Bad Disconnected Please go to [Setting->Watch List] to add app Setting->Accessibility Install Pebble APP Setting->Text-to-speech output
Rebuild Font Database Clean Notifications History Send a Message to Pebble Send a call to Pebble Restart Pebble Messenger
Begin to rebuild Finished cleaning the history The message is sent to Pebble The call is sent to Pebble The services are restarting.
Input message to your pebble Name of incoming call Number of incoming call Send Cancel
I more like my Pebble than rolex. 65432187 Rolex
